SELECT u.email AS email_address
     , u.handle
  FROM email_user u
     , coder_notify n
 WHERE u.user_id = n.coder_id
   AND u.status = 'A'
   AND n.notify_id = 1
   AND u.user_id not in (
          269025,7485898,275071,7459080,11797255,309982,13261056,156216,262936,153656,
          8355516,2059354,7390224,301395,8349097,8601171,10428762,7452866,10481120,270505,
          346607,9906197,287105,7390467,297823,7442498,7479769,289706,8357090,10599449,
          293874,155880,10574855,7462740,277659,301937,308453,274023,284007,107835,
          7445961,279471,7393427,287568,7338095,10157606,9958600,119676,13377493,7360309,
          150498,152342,7463987,302053,7548200,299979,10098406,7489235,7251152,7210680,
          286907,277356,278342,297731,7545675,289824
   );
